domino_project

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.Board
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardSolo1, MultiplayerBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Board on which any type of DominoGame happens.It consists of the line on where the tiles are put on.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DominoLine line
      Line on where tiles are put on by players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfFits(Tile tile)
      This method checks if the specified Tile(tile) given fits on either side of the line of this board.It is supposed that if the Line is empty then every tile fits in it.
      DominoLine getLine()
      Returns the DominoLine
      void placeTileToLine(Tile tile, int choice)
      This method puts the given tile to the line checking where it fits.
      void placeTileToLine(Tile tile, int choice, DominoLine l)
      This method does the same as the upper method but gets on more parameter to do the required type casting.

        protected DominoLine line
        Line on where tiles are put on by players.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()

    • Method Detail

      • placeTileToLine

        public void placeTileToLine(Tile tile,
                            int choice)
        This method puts the given tile to the line checking where it fits. Tile gets reversed if needed. If it fits both on beggining and at the end, the parameter choice determines where to be put.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be put to Line
        choice - an integer which represents the choice of the player to put the line either on the beggining(choice=1) either at the end(choice=2), when it fits on both.

      • placeTileToLine

        public void placeTileToLine(Tile tile,
                            int choice,
                            DominoLine l)
        This method does the same as the upper method but gets on more parameter to do the required type casting.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be put to Line
        choice - an integer which represents the choice of the player to put the line either on the beggining(choice=1) either at the end(choice=2), when it fits on both.
        l - DominoLine for the required type casting

      • checkIfFits

        public boolean checkIfFits(Tile tile)
        This method checks if the specified Tile(tile) given fits on either side of the line of this board.It is supposed that if the Line is empty then every tile fits in it.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked if fits on DominoLine of this board
        Returns:
        true if tile fits either on beggining or at the end, otherwise false.

      • getLine

        public DominoLine getLine()
        Returns the DominoLine
        Returns:
        DominoLine where the tiles are put on
